name: pongDS
description:
Description:

pongDS is a very simple pong clone made to run on the nintendo DS, made for the reason of getting more familiar with writing games for the DS. It's nothing fancy, really.

How to run without a DS:

  • Download the NDS file provided
  • Install DeSmuME,  a great emulator for DS games that I used for testing and that I wholeheartedly recommend.
  • Open DeSmuME, click on 'File' and 'Open Rom'
  • Select the NDS file you downloaded

How to run on a Homebrewed DS:

  • Close your DS and take out its SD card
  • Connect the SD card to your PC
  • Navigate to 'roms\nds' and place the NDS file there
  • You can find the game in the homebrew launcher
  • the icon's colors may be scuffed, but the game works at least, sorry
